gov.nasa.ial.mde.util
Class ByteArray

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.util.ByteArray

public class ByteArray
extends Object

The ByteArray class represents a variable length array of bytes that automatically grows in capacity as needed to hold the added data.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dan Dexter

Constructor Summary
ByteArray()
          Default constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void add(byte b)
          Adds the specified byte to the array.
 void add(byte[] b)
          Adds the specified array of bytes to the array.
 void add(byte[] b, int length)
          Adds the length number of bytes from the specified array to the byte-array.
 void clear()
          Clears the array of all data and the size will be zero.
 void ensureCapacity(int capacity)
          Ensures the array has at least the specified capacity.
 byte[] getBytes()
          Returns the bytes contained in the varaiable as a fixed size array.

ensureCapacity

Ensures the array has at least the specified capacity.

Parameters:

getBytes
